data.name: GUNS
data.description:
Welcome to shooting in 120 fps at our target-rich farm! This fun sandbox range gives you 22 weapons and various targets. Blast and fight with accurate ballistics and weapon mechanics!

Assault rifles (full auto): M4 5.56 - AK-47 7.62x39 - L85a3 5.56
Submachineguns (full auto): MAC-10 .45ACP - MP5A3 9mm - MP5SD variant 9mm - Thompson M1928A1 .45
Support: M203 40mm under-barrel - M67 Hand grenade
Rifles: AR-15 semi-auto 5.56 - Dragunov semi-auto 7.62 - M24 bolt action .308 - Barrett M107 semi-auto .50-cal
Shotguns: SPAS-12 12G - Benelli M4 12G - Sawn-off 12G - AA12 12G (full auto)
Handguns: M1911 .45 - Glock 17 9mm - Desert Eagle .50 - Beretta M9 9mm - Glock 44 .22lr - Colt Python 6-inch .357
Red dot optics, scopes, bipods, lasers and suppressors can be fitted.

Short and long ranges with:
- scarecrows that got loose and can hunt you,
- a ShootBarn - clear enemies from rooms and corridors,
- plinking, spinning, and destructible targets,
- scoring targets, moving or stationary,
  (bullseye, IPSC, and silhouette targets)
- clay pigeons, trap and skeet,
- the farmer's truck,
- some chickens,
- a 3-gun range,
- shot timer,
and more!

Game Discord invite: https://discord.gg/r3JYKWMYME
Game e-mail: gunsgame-1@yahoo.com
Game subreddit: reddit.com/r/gunsgame

Accurate ballistics (per ammunition type) and loading mechanics. 120 Hz works on the Quest 2  and 3 if enabled there in Settings/Experimental features! Install size is around 140 MB.

This game has a free demo to try  - GUNSdemo on App Lab.

changelog.change_log:
V. 0.756:

New SMG: the Thompson M1928A1 .45ACP!

New attachment: bipods for rifles! Grab with secondary hand to activate "stick-to-surface".

Also: Performance tweaks to improve frame rates, some bug fixes.

V. 0.742:
Some bug fixes + moved the AA12 to the tables!

V. 0.740:
December update: Hogs & lasers! Also a holiday surprise!

- New attachments: laser modules.
- New farm animal: hogs!
- New suppressors for assault and sniper rifles.
- A surprise for Christmas!

+++

- Grenades will now detonate if shot with a rifle,
- Open bolt system operational fixes,
- Graphical glitches fixed.

V. 0.715:
New weapons: 2 submachine guns! 

- MAC-10 .45ACP machine pistol, famously described by a police official as "fit only for combat in a phone booth",
- Heckler & Koch MP5A3 9mm submachine gun, of SWAT and SF fame, 
- Also the H&K MP5SD variant with integrated "Schalld√§mpfer" suppressor.

+++

- Bug and graphic fixes,
- Full auto sounds reworked.

V. 0.694:
In this small Halloween update:
A pumpkin launcher,
Bug fixes for the hand grenades - handle now pops correctly after hand switch, and ammo text is correct.

V. 0.686:
New weapon - M67 hand grenade!
Suppressors can now be fitted to semi-auto handguns.
Live round ejection now works properly.
Bug fix: Desert Eagle sight line corrected.

V. 0.668: 
- New weapon: Colt Python 6-inch revolver! 
- New plate targets, 
- Tables will now remember the last selected gun, 
- Handgun slides now lock back properly.
- Bug fix: the ShootBarn could previously be launched with multiple scarecrow copies.

V. 0.632: New weapons and a new attachment system! 
- L85a3 full auto assault rifle, 
- M203 40mm under-barrel attachment for M4, AR-15, L85a3, 
- New grenade damage model,
- Grab position tweaks,
- Bug fixes.
Known issues:
- Turning attachment on or off may change the off-hand grab point a few cm. This will be fixed in the next release.

V. 0.607: New guns! 
- Barrett M107 (anti-material rifle, .50-cal), 
- Sawn-off shotgun (12-gauge)
Also some new damage effects and adjustments!

V. 0.589:
New minigame: the ShootBarn! Clear the corridors of enemies - they shoot back if set to Aggressive!
Also: animation gitches fixed.

V. 0.575: New guns! 
- AK-47 (full auto assault rifle, 7.62x39), 
- Glock 44 suppressed (pistol, 22lr), 
- Scarecrow damage tweaks,
- Ammo belt handling fixes,
- Decal tweaks.

V. 0.561:
- Scarecrows can now attack and chase you, if set to aggressive,
- Easier to pick up handguns without grabbing slide by accident,
- Highlight to show charging handle for some rifles,
- Improved recoil simulation,
- Left hand gun handling bug fixes.

V. 0.548: 
- Better bullet casings! 
- Scarecrows can roam free,
- M4 full auto glitch fixed, 
- Glock and Desert Eagle recoil tweaks.

V. 0.541: New guns! 

M4 (full auto battle rifle, 5.56) 
Beretta M9 (pistol, 9mm) 

Also: 
Scarecrow target tweaks, texture tweaks.

V. 0.531:
New moving target: scarecrows! Spawnable if you need more!

V. 0.527:
Bug fix: Bullseye scoring now works as it should!

V. 0.525;
New scoring targets! IPSC, moose and deer profiles!

V 0.521: 
New assets for store page
